items.content_html: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.

With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.

items.content_html: A lightweight, multi-tier online bookstore with Node.js RESTful microservices for catalog and order handling, supported by a MySQL database. Features search by topic, book info retrieval, and purchasing capabilities, with distributed deployment and concurrent request management across separate services.
